Comment: Abilities: A00Y (Frost Bite), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Al-akir's attacks completely freeze enemy units slowing their attack by 250% and movement speed to 150. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Lasts 1 seconds on units, 0.4 second on heroes dealing 10 damage per second. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Lasts 2 seconds on units, .8 seconds on heroes dealing 20 damage per second. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Lasts 3 seconds on units, 1.2 seconds on heroes dealing 30 damage per second. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - lasts 4 seconds on units, 1.6 seconds on heroes dealing 40 damage per second.
